Question
========

30,000 telephone calls from the ICT department have a distribution with a mean duration of 173.9 seconds and a standard deviation of 184.8 seconds. You take a random sample of 80 calls. What then is the theoretical standard deviation?

Answerlist
----------

* 2.3 seconds
* 20.7 seconds
* 40 seconds
* 184.8 seconds

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.3 seconds: Incorrect
* 20.7 seconds: Correct
* 40 seconds: Incorrect
* 184.8 seconds: Incorrect
